value.0:
When you are standing near dye merchant simply say one of the following numbers to be issued the cloth, leather and metal dyes. Metal dye names are the ones in the brackets.

00 Lightest Brown (Silver)
01 Light Brown (Steel)
02 Brown (Dark Steel)
03 Dark Brown (Obsidian)
04 Lightest Tan (Light Grey)
05 Light Tan (Grey)
06 Tan (Dark Grey)
07 Dark Tan (Black)
08 Lightest Beige (Bright Yellow)
09 Light Beige (Yellow)
10 Beige (Muted Yellow)
11 Dark Beige (Dark Yellow)
12 Lightest Taupe (Bright Gold)
13 Light Taupe (Gold)
14 Taupe (Muted Gold)
15 Dark Taupe (Dark Gold)
16 Lightest Olive (Bright Orange)
17 Light Olive (Orange)
18 Olive (Muted Orange)
19 Dark Olive (Dark Orange)
20 Lightest Grey (Bright Copper)
21 Light Grey (Copper)
22 Grey (Muted Copper)
23 Dark Grey (Dark Copper)
24 Slate (Red)
25 Navy (Maroon)
26 Cerulean (Muted Red)
27 Blue (Muted Maroon)
28 Turquoise (Purple)
29 Teal (Dark Purple)
30 Green (Lavender)
31 Forest Green (Muted Lavender)
32 Yellow (Blue)
33 Goldenrod (Navy)
34 Orange (Muted Blue)
35 Burnt Orange (Muted Navy)
36 Light Red (Turquoise)
37 Red (Teal)
38 Pink (Muted Turquoise)
39 Fuchsia (Muted Teal)
40 Orchid (Green)
41 Purple (Dark Green)
42 Lavender (Muted Green)
43 Indigo (Deep Green)
44 White (Lime Green)
45 Black (Forest Green)
46 Shiny Navy (Pale Green)
47 Shiny Blue (Jungle Green)
48 Shiny Teal (Rainbow)
49 Shiny Forest Green (Muted Rainbow)
50 Shiny Goldenrod (Light Rust)
51 Shiny Burnt Orange (Mottled Rust)
52 Shiny Red (Dark Rust)
53 Shiny Fuchsia (Dark Mottled Rust)
54 Shiny Purple (Mottled Grey)
55 Shiny Indigo (Dark Mottled Grey)
56 Silver (Silver)
57 Obsidian (Obsidian)
58 Copper/Gold (Gold)
59 Pale Copper (Pale Copper)
60 Shiny Grey (Shiny Black)
61 Reflective (Reflective)
62 Pure White (Pure White)
63 Pure Black (Pure Black)

by ded 1o1 with thanks going to android79 for the "standardized" dye color names.
